sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AutoResolutionRefQualifier</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AutoResolutionRefQualifier</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AutoResolutionRefQualifier = Class.create();
AutoResolutionRefQualifier.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getActiveConfigurations: function(currentAutoResConfigSysID) {
		var activeConfigSysIDList = [];
		var autoResConfigGr = new GlideRecord(AutoResolutionConstants.CONFIG_TABLE_NAME);
		autoResConfigGr.addActiveQuery();
		if (currentAutoResConfigSysID)
			autoResConfigGr.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', currentAutoResConfigSysID);
		
		autoResConfigGr.query();
		while (autoResConfigGr.next())
			activeConfigSysIDList.push(autoResConfigGr.getValue('sys_id'));
		
		return 'sys_idIN' + activeConfigSysIDList.join(',');
	},

	getTemplates: function(tableName) {
		return 'global=true^table=' + tableName;
	},

    type: 'AutoResolutionRefQualifier'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-29 18:02:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0d98d045ff422010635f056d793bf1e5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AutoResolutionRefQualifier</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">85493a472f800110d8a4d5f62799b6a9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0d98d045ff422010635f056d793bf1e5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-26 17:59:01</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>770</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
